the earth is flat?
The answer to this question has been given by the Bible. The Book of Genesis, which was written in a time when man had no knowledge about God and that he could not understand anything else than what it said on its face (Genesis 1:1-3), states "God created all things." This means there are two kinds or types thereof; one kind consists only as an explanation for something other then itself being explained through revelation from heaven ("He who made everything" etc.).
